name: Legal Services
description: Specializing in commercial litigation, legal consultation in commercial law, and business registration. Services include company compliance, intellectual property registration, and foreign investment approvals.

name: Accounting Services
description: Offering statutory audits, internal audits, financial consulting, tax consulting, and business restructuring services tailored to your needs.

name: Personnel Services
description: Expert legal drafting, contract reviews, and compliance support for corporate and labor laws. Specialized in dispute resolution and insolvency proceedings.

name: Financial Consulting
description: Providing strategic planning, investment management, feasibility studies, and risk advisory services to streamline financial operations.

name: Corporate Compliance
description: Ensuring compliance with local and international laws, merger and acquisition advisory, and corporate salary management.
